author: Bioniclefan001
title: Not perfect but I still recommend it.
review:
Bulk 5.0/Brain Attack Review.

Before I got this set  had pretty much every vesion of Bulk. (Except the one from Bulk & Vapour) 
So I had high hopes for the next one, and I can say that though it`s not perfect, its still pretty good.

I think the 50 pcs are worth the  $11.99, but I had a problem with the set when I opened it.
One of the leg beam parts on the main body torso were bent upwards,but i put it over a stove and bent the plastic back in place,and besides that there were no problems.So when I built him he looked great,the shield and drill are good looking though the little missle on the side of the drill was unnecassary.(Though I think lego puts them in ALOT of sets that don`t need them) 

The expression on bulk`s face makes him look tough and the visor goes well with the color scheme which is grey,silver,orange,and gunmetal.The functions are the visor going up and down, the clamp-things that protect the hero core move, the drill spins, and theres the before mentioned missle on the side of the drill. So overall though he has his problems, I would reccomend either getting him or any of the other hero`s or villans. 

This is bioniclefan001 signing off. Though I wonder if that Jet Rocka set for the summer will fit Bulk and the other heroes, though of course Furno Xl won`t fit.

author: BulkFan98
title: Not Bulk's Best
review:
So Bulk's back after his freakin' awesome Breakout set, with this so-so set.
On to the pros and cons!

Pros:
It's Bulk.
Color scheme is pretty good.
If you put the shield on the back, it covers the back pretty good.
At 50 pieces, it's the second-biggest hero thus far (The biggest? Furno XL).

Cons:
Most of those 50 pieces go into making his drill.
Why a drill? It's an invasion of BRAINS. "Hey guys, let's drill 'em to death". -.-
Not a huge fan of the orange hands.
The armor is way too light!
He has a very odd expression. It looks like "Huh?" or "Waa? Granted, I would go "Waa?" if I was given a drill against brains.

All in all, it's an OK set. If I were you, I would get the set, then add some 2012 Bulk shins and a piece of wide gunmetal grey armor.
